com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.models

Class EventHubProducerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.models.EventHubProducerOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class EventHubProducerOptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The set of options that can be specified when creating an EventHubProducer to configure its behavior.
    See Also:
    EventHubProducer, EventHubAsyncClient.createProducer(EventHubProducerOptions)

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventHubProducerOptions

        public EventHubProducerOptions()

    • Method Detail

      • partitionId

        public EventHubProducerOptions partitionId(java.lang.String partitionId)
        Sets the identifier of the Event Hub partition that the EventHubProducer will be bound to, limiting it to sending events to only that partition. If the identifier is not specified, the Event Hubs service will be responsible for routing events that are sent to an available partition.
        Parameters:
        partitionId - The identifier of the Event Hub partition that the EventHubProducer will be bound to. If the producer wishes the events to be automatically to partitions, null; otherwise, the identifier of the desired partition.
        Returns:
        The updated EventHubProducerOptions object.

      • retry

        public EventHubProducerOptions retry(Retry retry)
        Sets the retry policy used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending.
        Parameters:
        retry - The retry policy used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending.
        Returns:
        The updated SenderOptions object.

      • timeout

        public EventHubProducerOptions timeout(java.time.Duration timeout)
        Sets the default timeout to apply when sending events. If the timeout is reached, before the Event Hub acknowledges receipt of the event data being sent, the attempt will be considered failed and will be retried.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The timeout to apply when sending events.
        Returns:
        The updated EventHubProducerOptions object.

      • retry

        public Retry retry()
        Gets the retry policy used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending.
        Returns:
        the retry policy used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending. If null, then the retry policy configured on the associated EventHubAsyncClient is used.

      • partitionId

        public java.lang.String partitionId()
        Gets the identifier of the Event Hub partition that the EventHubProducer will be bound to, limiting it to sending events to only that partition. If the identifier is not specified, the Event Hubs service will be responsible for routing events that are sent to an available partition.
        Returns:
        the identifier of the Event Hub partition that the EventHubProducer will be bound to.

      • timeout

        public java.time.Duration timeout()
        Gets the default timeout when sending events.
        Returns:
        The default timeout when sending events.

        A shallow clone of this object.
